description: Stop with the disorganized e-mails when trying to work on a team project and learn how to use SharePoint 2013 to collaborate with teammates. Let the experts at ClipTraining take you through a collaborative SharePoint online training course, first stop “Getting Started with SharePoint”, Then learn how to work your way through all the available features such as: Libraries, Communication and Collaboration, Working with Search and the Calendar, and much more.
title: Learn Microsoft SharePoint 2013
